Description.Text: Westlodge Hotel and Pondlodge Cottages is a family-run 3-star superior property offering comfortable accommodation in Bantry, West Cork. Highlights include excellent health and wellness facilities, onsite dining and picturesque surroundings. Bantry is a beautiful town situated in a peaceful setting in the heart of West Cork. It is home to the renowned West Cork Music Festival and West Cork Literacy Festival and provides numerous opportunities for outdoor activities. Nearby places of interest include Bantry House and Gardens, Glengarriff and Garnish Island. The hotel occupies a charming low-rise building set on 25 acres of landscaped gardens. Facilities include an indoor heated swimming pool, a sauna, steam room, Jacuzzi, gym, tennis court and nature trails. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are decorated in a traditional style. Amenities include a TV, telephone, tea and coffee equipment and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves fresh seafood specialities and a cosy dining room. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite.
